title: No popup menu in Java editor ruler (Photon)
description: When trying to access the popup menu on the left vertical ruler in the Java editor, the menu does not appear as expected.
OB: When right-clicking on the left vertical ruler in the Java editor, the expected popup menu to add breakpoints or marks does not show up.
EB: The popup menu for the Java editor ruler should appear when right-clicking on the left vertical ruler, allowing the user to add breakpoints or marks.
SR: To reproduce the issue: 1) Open a Java editor. 2) Right-click on the left vertical ruler. The popup menu to add breakpoints or marks should appear, but it does not.
